# 爱的复苏‘计划

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/aide-fusu-jihua
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/aide-fusu-jihua
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install aide-fusu-jihua
aide-fusu-jihua <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g aide-fusu-jihua
aide-fusu-jihua <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
